name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Design Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I excel in UX design and prototyping, utilizing tools like **Figma** to create user-centric interfaces. My technical skill set encompasses **JavaScript**, **React**, and **TypeScript**, which I leverage to build dynamic and responsive applications. I have a strong foundation in **AWS** for cloud deployment and am well-versed in continuous deployment practices to streamline workflow efficiencies. Beyond my technical proficiencies, I possess excellent communication skills, facilitating collaboration between design and development teams. My background also includes using state management libraries like **MobX** to enhance application performance, ensuring that I deliver tailored solutions that meet business objectives effectively.
